Description:
Detect file time attribute change to hide new or changes to existing files.

Author: Igor Fits, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Time Attribute Change - Linux
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where (type = 'execve' and log like '%touch%' and (log like '%-t%' or log like '%-acmr%' or log like '%-d%' or log like '%-r%'))
